themes.name: Charity Works
themes.author: Vvveb
themes.description: Charity Works is a modern and clean free charity foundation website template. When you would like to raise awareness for your non-profit organization, you better consider building a sophisticated online presence.

themes.name: Portfolio Magazine
themes.author: zidithemes
themes.description: Portfolio Magazine is a portfolio theme with  magazine and modern design. It is a free theme with a responsive design. Portfolio Magazine is perfect for your personal blog, portfolio, travel, photography, magazine , news , business , fashion , fitness , shop , education , health ,  ecommerce or any content-focused website. It is a simple news and magazine design and multi-purpose theme compatible with elementor , divi , gutenberg page builder and woocommerce, seo, translation and RTL ready.
